Title: A Good Death Is Hard to Find
Writer: Craig Johnson (book), Hunt Baldwin (developer), John Coveny (developer), Tony Tost
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Bailey Chase
Plot: Longmire needs Lucien Connally's help after a convicted dinosaur bone thief is killed in prison, and Vic continues to be harassed by an old enemy from Philadelphia.
